name: Dewy & Hydrated Skin Trio Skincare Set
about: What it is:An intensely hydrating three-piece set with a travel-size toner, mini serum, and full-size face cream, so you can feel good in your skin..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Pores, Dryness, and Redness.Highlighted Ingredients:- Damask Rose Extract: Supports a strong skin barrier..What Else You Need to Know:Keep your skin hydrated and visibly glowing with this must-have routine. Swipe on the Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Toner to soften and refine the look of pores. Then apply the ultra-hydrating Rose & Squalane Deep Hydration Oil-Infused Serum to nourish your skin. Finish up with the intensely hydrating Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Moisturizer for barrier support and dewy, plump-looking skin..This Set Contains:- 3.3 oz/ 100 mL Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Toner.Clinical Results:Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Toner:.Clean at SephoraOur commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificingÂ effectiveness.
ingredients: -Damask Rose Extract: Supports a strong skin barrier..-Hyaluronic Acid: Attracts and maintains moisture..-Squalane: Protects and moisturizes skin...Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Toner:.Water, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Rosa Centifolia Flower, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Rosa Multiflora Fruit Extract, Angelica Keiskei Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, PEG-150, PPG-26-Buteth-26, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Sodium Citrate, Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid, BHT, Parfum (Fragrance), Phenoxyethanol, Citronellol, Geraniol...Rose & Squalane Deep Hydration Oil-Infused Serum:.Aqua (Water), Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, C9-12 Alkane, Propanediol, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Pentylene Glycol, Glycerin, Squalane, Rosa Damascena Flower Extract, Rosa Damascena Extract, Camelina Sativa Seed Oil, Rosa Rubiginosa Seed Oil, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Tocopherol, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Chloride, Ethylhexylglycerin, Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid, Caprylic/Capric Tri-glyceride, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, 1,2- Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Citronellol, Geraniol...Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Moisturizer:.Aqua (Water), Glycerin, C15-19 Alkane, Butylene Glycol, Propanediol, Isostearyl Isostearate, Hexyl Laurate, Pentylene Glycol, 1,2 Hexanediol, Behenyl Alcohol, Steareth-2, Prunus Domestica Seed Oil, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Rosa Damascena Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Angelica Keiskei Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Silica, Dimethicone, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Steareth-21, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Squalane, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Tromethamine, Xanthan Gum, Dimethiconol, Polysorbate 60, Algin, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Acacia Senegal Gum, Serine, Caramel, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Citronellol, Geraniol...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Toner:.-Pour onto a cotton pad and sweep over your face and neck..-Use daily, morning and night, after cleansing and before your serum and moisturizer...Rose & Squalane Deep Hydration Oil-Infused Serum:.-Pour onto a cotton pad and sweep over your face and neck..-Use daily, morning and night, after cleansing and before your serum and moisturizer...Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Moisturizer:.-Apply to your face and neck daily, morning and night.
